entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 11:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
